title: Your tailor
text: Created web-site from a scratch. Used references from other tailor services to make the design and logo in figma. Landing page with 1 JS file for accordion to display the list of services.

title: Mesto.
text: Social network web page with authorization and registration. You can change profile picture, description, add new posts and like others. Open pictures with popups.

title: Video hooks
text: Used axio to connect to youtube api, created custom hook useVideos for a video search.

title: Todo list
text: Todo list for editing, deleting and creating new tasks. Resposive design.

title: Natours
text: Landing page for adventurous tours with sign in form

title: Travel across Russia
text: Landing page 'Travel Across Russia' with adaptive design

title: Officelite
text: Simple landing page with JS countdown.

title: Widgets
text: Created tabs for diffrent pages sush as Accordion, Dropdown, Search and Translate.

title: How to learn
text: 1st work. Landing page How to Learn. Used animation.
